name: Default OpenAI Settings
title: Default OpenAI Settings
ocr_prompt: Extract all text from this image. Return the result as clean, structured text maintaining the original layout and formatting where possible.
classification_prompt: Analyze this document image and classify it. Return a JSON object with: {"document_type": "type", "confidence": 0.95, "suggested_doctype": "ERPNext DocType", "key_fields": ["field1", "field2"]}
extraction_prompt: Extract structured data from this document. Return a JSON object with all identifiable fields and their values. Include dates, amounts, names, addresses, and any other relevant information. Use these field names when possible: customer_name, supplier_name, date, due_date, total, tax, description, address, phone, email, reference, items (as array).
